SummaryEnglish: Crayon Shin-chan is a popular yet controversial Japanese anime series. FUNimation made their dub more mature in content compared to the original. Shin is a 5-year-old boy who is constantly doing and saying inappropriate things, much to the dismay and annoyance of those around him, with hilarious results. Shin along with his family including his little sister Himawari and his dog Shiro, as well as his friends from kindergarten, ends up turning everyday situations into funny adventures.
SummaryJapanese: イタズラ大好きでナマイキ盛りの幼稚園児･野原しんのすけが巻き起こす騒動と、ふりまわされる大人たちの毎日を、ギャグをふんだんにまじえて描いたアニメ。1992年に放送スタートして以来、子どもから大人まで幅広い層に愛され続け、お茶の間に大反響を巻き起こしてきた。これまで30カ国以上で放送されており、日本でいちばん有名な5歳児･野原しんのすけは、今や“国民的キャラクター”の枠を超え、インド、スペイン、台湾、韓国などを中心に各国に熱烈なファンを持つ“世界の人気者”に成長している。

70.TitleJapanese: 熊本のじいちゃんのヒミツだゾ / 星を見に行くゾ / 帰ってきた!鑑識しんちゃんだゾ
70.SummaryJapanese: 「熊本のじいちゃんのヒミツだゾ」 熊本のじいちゃん・よし治が、家族に黙って東京に行ってしまう。心配したばあちゃんからの連絡を受け、ひろしとしんのすけは少ない手がかりを頼りによし治の動向を探るのだが……！？ 「星を見に行くゾ」 高台にある公園に星を見に行く野原一家。そこで偶然、ネネちゃんたち桜田一家と出会う。家族だけで星を見たかったネネちゃんママは、野原一家の振る舞いにイライラをつのらせ……？ 「帰ってきた！鑑識しんちゃんだゾ」 高倉家で事件が発生した。現場にやって来たのは、しんのすけたち「特命鑑識捜査課」。彼らは、どんな簡単な事件も迷宮入りにしてしまうというとんでもないチームで……！？

71.TitleEnglish: Crayon Shin-chan Movie 21: Very Tasty! B-class Gourmet Survival!! (2013)
71.TitleJapanese: クレヨンしんちゃん バカうまっ！ B級グルメサバイバル!!
71.SummaryJapanese: みんな大好き「B級グルメ」に、消滅の危機!? 庶民の味を守るため、カスカベ防衛隊が伝説のソースを運ぶ、運ぶ、運ぶ。 燃えよ！やきそば!!焦がせ！友情!!

72.TitleEnglish: Real Play-Doh with Michi & Yoshirin / This is how they bought their house (1) (2)
72.TitleJapanese: ミッチー＆ヨシリンとリアルおままごとだゾ 	 若い二人はこうして家を買ったゾ (1 y 2)

73.TitleEnglish: Crayon Shin-chan Movie 22: Serious Battle! Robot Dad Strikes Back (2014)

74.TitleEnglish: Suspense on Shinkansen! (1) (2) / Kazama never forgets anything / Buying new shoes
74.TitleJapanese: 新幹線でサスペンスだゾ 	 新幹線でサスペンスだゾ(2) 	 風間くんは忘れ物しないゾ 	 新しい靴を買うゾ

75.TitleEnglish: Crayon Shin-chan Movie 23: My Moving Story! Cactus Large Attack! (2015)
75.TitleJapanese: [映画]オラの引越し物語〜サボテン大襲撃〜

76.TitleEnglish: Crayon Shin-chan Movie 18: Super-Dimension! The Storm Called My Bride
76.TitleJapanese: クレヨンしんちゃん 超時空!嵐を呼ぶオラの花嫁

77.TitleEnglish: Crayon Shin-chan Movie 23: My Moving Story! Cactus Large Attack! (2015)
77.TitleJapanese: クレヨンしんちゃん オラの引越し物語～サボテン大襲撃～
77.SummaryJapanese: 父・ひろしの転勤で、春日部のみんなと涙のお別れを決意した野原一家。行き先はなんと…ラテンのリズムぶりぶりのメキシコ！！おねいさんがみんなボン・キュッ・ボボ～ンと聞いて喜んで旅立つしんのすけだが、待っていたのは…動くキラーサボテンだった…！！

78.TitleEnglish: Suspense on Shinkansen! (1) (2) / Kazama never forgets anything / Buying new shoes
78.TitleJapanese: 新幹線でサスペンスだゾ（前後編） / 風間くんは忘れ物しないゾ / 新しい靴を買うゾ
78.SummaryJapanese:
「新幹線でサスペンスだゾ（前後編）」
野原家が“新幹線密室サスペンス”に巻き込まれた？！謎の美女、美女を狙う怪しい男たち…そして平凡な家族を乗せて、時速200kmの密室＝新幹線が走り出す！！！！

「風間くんは忘れ物しないゾ」
忘れ物が続くしんのすけを注意していた風間くん。「ぼくは生まれてから一度も忘れ物をしたことがない！」とどや顔で言っていたのだが…。

「新しい靴を買うゾ」
今履いているクツが小さくなり、破けてしまっていたしんのすけ。みさえとひまわりと共に、新しいクツを買いに行くのだが、なかなか気に入るデザイン、色、サイズが見つからなくて…。

79.TitleEnglish: Kumamoto Grandpa's Secret / Let's go see the stars / It's back! It's Forensics Shin-chan!
79.TitleJapanese: 熊本のじいちゃんのヒミツだゾ / 星を見に行くゾ / 帰ってきた!鑑識しんちゃんだゾ
79.SummaryJapanese: 「熊本のじいちゃんのヒミツだゾ」 熊本のじいちゃん・よし治が、家族に黙って東京に行ってしまう。心配したばあちゃんからの連絡を受け、ひろしとしんのすけは少ない手がかりを頼りによし治の動向を探るのだが……！？ 「星を見に行くゾ」 高台にある公園に星を見に行く野原一家。そこで偶然、ネネちゃんたち桜田一家と出会う。家族だけで星を見たかったネネちゃんママは、野原一家の振る舞いにイライラをつのらせ……？ 「帰ってきた！鑑識しんちゃんだゾ」 高倉家で事件が発生した。現場にやって来たのは、しんのすけたち「特命鑑識捜査課」。彼らは、どんな簡単な事件も迷宮入りにしてしまうというとんでもないチームで……！？

80.TitleEnglish: Crayon Shin-chan Movie 24: Fast Asleep! Dreaming World Big Assault! (2016)
80.TitleJapanese: クレヨンしんちゃん 爆睡！ ユメミーワールド大突撃
80.SummaryJapanese: 劇団ひとり×「ロボとーちゃん」髙橋 渉がタッグを組んだ脚本でお送りする、不思議な物語。 「夢」の世界で待つのは楽しい未来か、悪夢か？いざ、おやすみなさい！

81.TitleEnglish: Crayon Shin-chan Shrouded in Mystery! The Flowers of Tenkazu Academy
81.SummaryEnglish: An authentic (style) school mystery is born here! At Kazama-kun's invitation, Shinnosuke and his friends decide to enroll in the super elite boarding school ``Private Tenka Unification Kasukabe Gakuen'', commonly known as Tenkasu Gakuen, for a week! Has Kazama-kun turned into an idiot after getting caught up in the mysterious incidents that occur frequently at the school? ! In order to uncover the truth of the incident, Shinnosuke and his friends set up the "Kasukabe Detective Club"! What did Shinnosuke and his friends discover through their stray deductions?
81.TitleJapanese: クレヨンしんちゃん 謎メキ！花の天カス学園
81.SummaryJapanese:
本格（風）学園ミステリー、ここに誕生！
しんのすけたちは風間くんの誘いで
全寮制の超エリート校「私立天下統一カスカベ学園」、通称・天カス学園に1週間体験入学することに！
学園で多発する怪事件に巻き込まれ、風間くんがおバカに？！
事件の真相を解明すべく、しんのすけたちは「カスカベ探偵倶楽部」をケッ成!
しんのすけたちが迷推理の先に見つけたモノとはー

82.SummaryEnglish: The Noharas go on an Action Mask-themed cruise, where all the grown-ups get kidnapped by a gang of monkeys. It's up to the kids to rescue them!
82.TitleJapanese: クレヨンしんちゃん 嵐を呼ぶジャングル
82.SummaryJapanese: 「野生のおバカが目をさます！」 豪華客船にこどもだけで取り残されてしまったカスカベ防衛隊のみんな。 さらわれたアクション仮面たちのために、ジャングルを探検だ！

83.TitleEnglish: Crayon Shin-chan Movie 1: Action Mask vs. Leotard Devil
83.SummaryEnglish: Everyone's favorite TV superhero Action Mask shows up in Kasukabe, and he's trying to get something from Shin-chan -- but what could it be?
83.TitleJapanese: クレヨンしんちゃん アクション仮面 ＶＳ ハイグレ魔王
83.SummaryJapanese:
記念すべき映画第1作だゾ。 ハイグレ魔王のせいで、み?んなハイグレになっちゃった！
戦え、我らがヒーロー、アクション仮面。 がんばれ、戦士しんのすけ！

84.TitleEnglish: Crayon Shin-chan: The Hidden Treasure of the Buri Buri Kingdom
84.SummaryEnglish: The Noharas win a vacation to the Kingdom of Buri Buri -- but the whole thing was just a clever ploy by an evil organization to kidnap Shin-chan!
84.TitleJapanese: クレヨンしんちゃん ブリブリ王国の秘宝
84.SummaryJapanese: 映画第2作では、しんちゃんが二人になった!? 南の島のブリブリ王国で、しんのすけそっくりのスンノケシ王子とご対面。 ブリブリ魔人もあらわれて、もう大変！

85.SummaryEnglish: A time traveler claims that bad guys are trying to change the past! Shin-chan is on the case, going back in time to defeat the evil Lord Unkokusai.
85.TitleJapanese: クレヨンしんちゃん 雲黒斎の野望
85.SummaryJapanese: こんどは戦国時代へタイムトリップ。 歴史を変えようとしているニオウやつ、「雲黒斎（うんこくさい）」の野望を止めろ！ カンタムロボも活躍するゾ。

86.TitleEnglish: Crayon Shin-chan: Great Adventure In Henderland
86.SummaryEnglish: The Futaba Kindergarten kids are so excited for their trip to the Henderland amusement park, but Shin-chan soon learns there are evil forces at play!
86.TitleJapanese: クレヨンしんちゃん ヘンダーランドの大冒険
86.SummaryJapanese: みんなで遠足に行った「群馬ヘンダーランド」は、実は地球制服をもくろむ魔女のアジトだった！ アクション仮面やカンタムロボ、ぶりぶりざえもんといっしょに悪を叩け。

87.TitleEnglish: Crayon Shin-chan: Pursuit of the Balls of Darkness
87.SummaryEnglish: The Noharas get caught between two rival clans when Himawari swallows a pretty bead that turns out to be a mysterious ball with hidden powers.
87.TitleJapanese: クレヨンしんちゃん 暗黒タマタマ大追跡
87.SummaryJapanese: アクション満載の第5作。 暗黒魔人復活のカギとなる、２つの「タマ」...その一つをひまわりが飲み込んでしまった！ 世界征服をめぐる戦いに巻き込まれた野原一家の運命は？

88.TitleEnglish: Crayon Shin-chan: Dengeki! Buta no Hizume Daisakusen
88.SummaryEnglish: It all begins when a secret agent hiding in the ship where dinner Futaba school students. The Pig Hoof follow and take the boat with her, Shin Chan and his friends on board. From there, Shin Chan, Masao, Nene, Kazama and Boo Chan van with Agent everywhere as their hostages.
88.TitleJapanese: クレヨンしんちゃん 電撃！ ブタのヒヅメ大作戦
88.SummaryJapanese: 「このおバカ、恐るべし。」 巨大飛行船を舞台に、秘密組織"ブタのヒヅメ"を倒すため、カスカベ防衛隊が大暴れ！ そしてカギを握るのは、あのぶりぶりざえもん!?

89.TitleEnglish: Crayon Shin-chan: Explosion! The Hot Spring's Feel Good Final Battle
89.SummaryEnglish: There's only one way to stop a filthy evil scientist from destroying the world, and it's with a powerful hot spring located under Shin-chan's house!
89.TitleJapanese: クレヨンしんちゃん 爆発！ 温泉わくわく大決戦
89.SummaryJapanese: 伝説の温泉"金魂の湯"（きんたまの湯）は、なんと野原家に涌いていた！ 6本のショートムービーが楽しい「クレしんパラダイス！メイド・イン・埼玉」も同時上映。

90.SummaryEnglish: The Noharas go on an Action Mask-themed cruise, where all the grown-ups get kidnapped by a gang of monkeys. It's up to the kids to rescue them!
90.TitleJapanese: クレヨンしんちゃん 嵐を呼ぶジャングル
90.SummaryJapanese: 「野生のおバカが目をさます！」 豪華客船にこどもだけで取り残されてしまったカスカベ防衛隊のみんな。 さらわれたアクション仮面たちのために、ジャングルを探検だ！

91.TitleEnglish: Shin Chan: The Adult Empire Strikes Back
91.SummaryEnglish: Shin-chan must rescue the adults of Kasukabe when they mysteriously abandon their responsibilities to relive their youth at the new 20th-century expo.
91.TitleJapanese: クレヨンしんちゃん 嵐を呼ぶ モーレツ！オトナ帝国の逆襲
91.SummaryJapanese: クレしん映画ブームを巻き起こした一作。 レトロの世界に大人がハマりすぎて、帰ってこなくなった... このままじゃ、未来がなくなっちゃう!? 走れ、しんのすけ！

92.TitleEnglish: Caryon Shin-chan: A Storm-invoking Splendor! The Battle of the Warring States
92.SummaryEnglish: Shin-chan somehow travels back in time, where he promptly involves himself in samurai wars and political intrigue, changing history left and right!
92.TitleJapanese: クレヨンしんちゃん 嵐を呼ぶ アッパレ！戦国大合戦

93.TitleEnglish: Crayon Shin-chan: The Glorious Storm-invoking Yakiniku Road
93.SummaryEnglish: It's yakiniku night for the Noharas! But before they can dig in, they get wrapped up in a sizzling conspiracy and are forced to go on the run.
93.TitleJapanese: クレヨンしんちゃん 嵐を呼ぶ 栄光のヤキニクロード
93.SummaryJapanese: 「野原一家、大疾走!!それは、すべて最高級ヤキニクのため...」焼肉を楽しみに、夕食を待つ一家。 ところが、みんな指名手配されるし、謎の組織に追われるし...

94.TitleEnglish: Crayon Shin-chan: Invoke a Storm! The Kasukabe Boys of the Evening Sun
94.SummaryEnglish: At a strange movie theater, everyone gets sucked into the film they're watching. The longer they stay, the less they remember about the real world!
94.TitleJapanese: クレヨンしんちゃん 嵐を呼ぶ！ 夕陽のカスカベボーイズ
94.SummaryJapanese: ケツ作おバカロニウエスタン！ 風間くんもマサオくんもネネちゃんも、記憶を失って西部劇の世界の住人になっちゃった。 もとの世界に帰りたいけど...けっこう楽しいゾ!?

95.TitleEnglish: Crayon Shin-chan: The Legend Called Buri Buri 3 Minutes Charge
95.SummaryEnglish: After a noodle-loving time traveler shows up, Shin-chan and his parents transform into superheroes, fighting monsters three minutes in the future!
95.TitleJapanese: クレヨンしんちゃん 伝説を呼ぶ ブリブリ３分ポッキリ大進撃
95.SummaryJapanese: 3分後の未来に行って怪獣を倒さないと世界が滅んじゃう!? 地球を守る大役をまかされた野原一家。 3分ポッキリの戦いを繰り返すうちに、じわじわピンチが訪れて...

96.TitleEnglish: Crayon Shin-chan: The Legend Called: Dance! Amigo!
96.SummaryEnglish: Something sinister's afoot in Kasukabe. Shin-chan doesn't know what it is, but he's pretty sure it involves samba-dancing doppelgängers.
96.TitleJapanese: クレヨンしんちゃん 伝説を呼ぶ 踊れ！アミーゴ！
96.SummaryJapanese: カスカベの都市伝説、「そっくり人間」。 しんのすけに迫る、みさえそっくりのニセモノ。 ホンモノの家族を守るため、おケツに力を込めて、ダンスバトルがはじまる！

97.TitleEnglish: Crayon Shin-chan: Invoke a Storm! The Singing Buttocks Bomb
97.SummaryEnglish: When an alien bomb powerful enough to destroy the entire planet sticks to the buttocks of Shin-chan's pet dog Shiro, a race to save the world begins.
97.TitleJapanese: クレヨンしんちゃん 嵐を呼ぶ 歌うケツだけ爆弾！
97.SummaryJapanese: 今度の主役はシロ!? シロのおケツに、地球を吹っ飛ばすほどの爆弾がくっついちゃった！ シロは誰にも渡さない...全世界65億人を敵に回した、ひとりと1匹の逃亡劇。

98.TitleEnglish: Crayon Shin-chan: Invoke a Super Storm! The Hero of Kinpoko
98.SummaryEnglish: A sinister force is invading the neighborhood, and Shinnosuke is the only one who notices -- until a kid named Mata appears to help him save the day.
98.TitleJapanese: クレヨンしんちゃん ちょー嵐を呼ぶ 金矛の勇者
98.SummaryJapanese: たちあがれ勇者しんのすけ。 開かれた闇の扉...魔の手に気づいているのは、しんのすけただ一人。 伝説の神器・金矛（キンポコ）を手に、地球をお守りするのだ！

99.TitleEnglish: Crayon Shin-chan: Roar! Kasukabe Animal Kingdom
99.SummaryEnglish: Shin-chan's parents have turned into animals, and environmental extremists are to blame! Shin-chan's going to have to put things right.
99.TitleJapanese: クレヨンしんちゃん オタケベ！ カスカベ野生王国
99.SummaryJapanese: ゆきすぎたエコで、人類を動物にしようとする過激組織「スケッベ」。 いちど動物にされると、人としての記憶を失ってしまう... オラのことわかんないの？かーちゃーん!!

100.TitleEnglish: Crayon Shin-chan: Intense Battle! Robo Dad Strikes Back
100.SummaryEnglish: A diabolical plot to empower pushover dads causes Shin-chan's father to return home as a robot. The Nohara family bond is about to be put to the test!
100.TitleJapanese: クレヨンしんちゃん ガチンコ！ 逆襲のロボとーちゃん
100.SummaryJapanese: ある日、とーちゃんがロボットになって帰ってきた！動き出す巨大な陰謀。 しんちゃん映画史上もっともアツイ オヤジの戦いに、日本中の家族が涙する...！

101.SummaryEnglish: Shinnosuke - Osiri, sealed!! In order to restore To-chan-ka-chan, who was turned into a child by the alien Shiriri's mysterious beam, he hides the alien Shiriri in Osiri and travels across Japan!
101.TitleJapanese: クレヨンしんちゃん 襲来!! 宇宙人シリリ
101.SummaryJapanese: しんのすけ ー オシリ、封印!! 宇宙人シリリの謎のビームで子どもになってしまったとーちゃんかーちゃんを元に戻すため、オシリに宇宙人シリリを隠して日本縦断！

102.TitleEnglish: Crayon Shin-chan: Burst Serving! Kung Fu Boys ~Ramen Rebellion~
102.SummaryEnglish: Shin-chan is all set to challenge Kung Fu in the Chinatown of Kasukabe city, known as Aiyā Town. He and the Kasukabe Defence Force are going to put up a totally no-stunt Kung Fu challenge on the stage.
102.TitleJapanese: クレヨンしんちゃん 爆盛！カンフーボーイズ ～拉麺大乱～
102.SummaryJapanese: 春日部にある中華街"アイヤータウン"で、食べた人が凶暴化する恐ろしいラーメンが大流行。このラーメンパニックに、カスカベ防衛隊が伝説のカンフー"ぷにぷに拳"で立ち向かう!!　全篇ノースタントで贈る、おバカンフーアクション超大作！

103.TitleEnglish: Crayon Shin-chan: Honeymoon Hurricane ~The Lost Hiroshi~
103.SummaryEnglish: Hiroshi and Misae have never been to a honeymoon trip to a foreign country. One day, Misae discovered an inexpensive and family-friendly holiday package to Australia and the Nohara family decided to make it their first honeymoon vacation. Hiroshi gets kidnapped upon arrival to Australia, leaving Shinnosuke, Misae and others on a dangerous journey. It turns out that Hiroshi is the key to a secret treasure. The remaining members of the Nohara Family must rescue Hiroshi, while a mysterious masked man and treasure hunters from all over the world are after him. The struggle is among three different groups in this action-filled treasure hunting adventure.
103.TitleJapanese: クレヨンしんちゃん 新婚旅行ハリケーン ～失われたひろし～
103.SummaryJapanese: まさかの"ひろし＝お宝のカギ"!! 伝説の秘境で、謎の仮面族VS世界中のトレジャーハンターVS野原一家の、三つ巴のひろし争奪戦が勃発!!! 大冒険の先に、野原一家が見つけたものとは...!?

104.TitleEnglish: Crayon Shin-Chan: Crash! Rakuga Kingdom and Almost Four Heroes
104.SummaryEnglish: The kingdom that floats above in the sky, that uses free doodles as an energy source, “Rakuga Kingdom.” However, now in the face of a lack in energy, they are on the brink of ruin. In order to force the creation of doodles, the kingdom’s army begins its attack on Kasukabe on the surface! Meanwhile, as the drawings begin to move, the hero who is bestowed the hidden treasure of the kingdom, the “Miracle Crayon”—is none other than the “super happy-go-lucky 5-year-old,” Nohara Shinnosuke!! Together as the “Almost Four Heroes,” Shinnosuke and the drawn doodles try to take back Kasukabe! Amongst that, they discover the weakness of the doodles, where they dissolve upon contact with water! To make matters worse, a raincloud that looks to start pouring at any moment hovers above… What awaits their encounter with the doodles and the end of their adventure—will it be smiles, or tears!?
104.TitleJapanese: クレヨンしんちゃん 激突！ラクガキングダムとほぼ四人の勇者
104.SummaryJapanese: 地上のラクガキをエネルギーに浮かぶ王国・ラクガキングダム。本作のカギとなるのは描いたものが動き出す王国の秘宝・ミラクルクレヨン！世界の平和はしんのすけと、しんのすけが描いたラクガキたちに託された！はたして、しんのすけとラクガキたちは世界をお助けできるのか!?

105.TitleEnglish: Crayon Shin-chan the Movie: The Tornado Legend of Ninja Mononoke
105.SummaryEnglish: One day, a woman named Chiyome Hesogakure with a child named Chinzō visits the Nohara family and claims that she is the real mother of Shinnosuke and takes him away to a Ninja Village. In the Ninja Village, the Hesogakure family has been protecting "the earth's navel" by blocking it with a pure gold stopper using the "Mononoke technique" that has been passed down from generation. If it comes off, the earth will wither, the rotation will stop, and the "tomorrow" of the world will be lost! It is up to Shinnosuke to reveal the mystery of his birth and protect the future of the earth and the "tomorrow" of his family.
105.TitleJapanese: クレヨンしんちゃん もののけニンジャ珍風伝
105.SummaryJapanese:
今、明かされる「しんのすけ」出生の真実──
雨の日にひろしとみさえのもとに可愛らしい赤ちゃんが誕生した。ひろしが考えた名前のメモは濡れてほとんど読めなくなっていたが、読める文字を繋げてみると「しん...の...すけ」。あれから5年、野原家に1人の女性が訪れる。ちよめと名乗るその女性の口から信じられない言葉が...。「私、しんのすけさんの本当の親なんです。」ひろしとみさえは戸惑いながらも、身ひとつで来たちよめを追い返すわけにもいかず、その日は野原家に泊めることに。しかし、その夜突如謎の忍者軍団が襲い掛かる！ 瞬く間に連れ去られるちよめとしんのすけ。果たして「しんのすけ」の運命は？ 本当の「家族」とは一体!?

106.TitleEnglish: Crayon Shin-Chan Movie: Supernatural Battle - Sticky Sushi Rolls
106.SummaryEnglish: One night, a dark light and a white light fly in from space and approach the Japanese archipelago, descending onto an ordinary house in Kasukabe City, Saitama Prefecture. The white light hits Shinnosuke, who is waiting for dinner to be ready as usual. A mysterious power surges through his body. "My butt... my butt is hot...!?" He gives in to the power and focuses his attention on his butt, causing the toy to float softly in the air. "This is going to be something terrible..." Meanwhile, a man who was bathed in a dark light and gained psychic powers goes on a rampage. A man who wishes for the destruction of this world. Destruction, chaos, screams of hell. Just as fear was about to take over all of Japan, Shinnosuke rises up! Dark Esper vs. Shinnosuke A "new dimension" super psychic showdown that runs freely through space will heat up all of Japan this summer!
106.TitleJapanese: しん次元！クレヨンしんちゃんTHE MOVIE 超能力大決戦 〜とべとべ手巻き寿司〜
106.SummaryJapanese:
ある夜、宇宙から飛来してきた暗黒の光と白い光が日本列島へと接近、埼玉県カスカベ市のごくフツーの住宅へ降下していく。
いつものように夕飯が出来上がるのを今か今かと待っていたしんのすけにその白い光は命中する。
体にみなぎる不思議な力。
「お尻が...お尻が熱いッ...!?」
その力に身を任せ、お尻に意識を集中するとおもちゃがフワフワと宙に浮く。
「これは、とんでもないことになるゾ...」
一方、暗黒の光を浴び、超能力を手に入れた男は暴走を始める。
この世界の破滅を望む男。破壊、混乱、阿鼻叫喚。恐怖が日本中を支配しようとしたその時、しんのすけが立ち上がる！
暗黒のエスパーvsしんのすけ
空間を縦横無尽に駆け巡る、"しん次元"ちょー超能力大決戦が、この夏、日本中をアツくする──！

107.TitleJapanese: 映画クレヨンしんちゃん公開記念　ぶりぶりざえもんスペシャル
107.SummaryJapanese:
野原家に隕石が落下！　壊れた家を直さなくてはならない。
しんのすけが呼び出したぶりぶりざえもんを、宇宙人ということにして、その修繕費を稼ごうとするが……。

108.TitleEnglish: Macaroni Enpitsu Shin-chan Movie Release Commemoration
108.TitleJapanese: 映画公開記念　マカロニえんぴつしんちゃん映画公開記念　マカロニえんぴつしんちゃんSP
108.SummaryJapanese:
もしもしんのすけが小学生だったら…？
アクション小学校のピカピカの一年生、野原しんのすけ。しかし小学生になっても、幼稚園時代と変わらず担任の姫宮先生に迷惑をかけまくりで―！！

小学生になったしんのすけの楽しくて笑えるお話をお届け～
公開中映画の最新情報もタップリ～♪

109.TitleEnglish: Movie Release Commemoration: Ninja Training Special
109.TitleJapanese: 映画クレヨンしんちゃん公開記念　忍者修行でござるゾSP
109.SummaryJapanese:
「カスカベ忍者隊だゾ　天の巻・地の巻」のお話を特別放送！
さらに、“忍者しんのすけ”による映画「もののけニンジャ珍風伝」の最新情報もタップリお届け～♪

110.TitleJapanese: オールマサオ大進撃スペシャル
110.SummaryJapanese:
アクション仮面に出て来る悪役ダークシャドーが、マサオくんにそっくりだと幼稚園で話題になる。
そこでマサオくんはダークシャドーのコスプレをしてみるのだが……!?

111.TitleEnglish: Let's have summer vacation together Special
111.SummaryJapanese:
オラのドキムネ～な夏のお話をタップリお届け～！

『キャンプへ行くゾ』…キャンプに出かけようとする野原一家。
そこへ突然やって来た秋田のじいちゃん、ばあちゃんも一緒に行くことになる。道中様々なトラブルを乗り越え、予定より大幅に遅れてキャンプ場に到着するが……。

『ひみつちゃんと勝負だゾ』…キャンプ場で不思議な女の子、“ひみつちゃん”と出会うしのすけ。二人はスイカをかけて勝負することに。
だが決着はなかなかつかず、いつの間にか二人は仲良しになる。

『ひみつちゃんは友だちだゾ』…ちょっとしたことからケンカをしてしまうしんのすけと“ひみつちゃん”。
次の日の朝、しんのすけは仲直りしようと、“ひみつちゃん”を探しまわるが……。

公開中映画の最新情報もタップリ～♪
みんなで見れば～

112.TitleEnglish: The consumption tax is going up / Idol Senpai is here / I want to eat Chocobi ice cream
112.TitleJapanese: 消費税が上がるゾ / アイドル先輩が来たゾ / チョコビアイスが食べたいゾ

113.TitleEnglish: It's time for a match in the Osiris ring / Mommy will help you
113.TitleJapanese: オシーリングで勝負だゾ / 母ちゃんがおたすけするゾ

114.TitleEnglish: I'm the zookeeper of twin pandas / It's a super-sized ramen / It's a fast-flying paper airplane
114.TitleJapanese: オラ、双子パンダの飼育係だゾ / 爆盛！のはらーめんだゾ / よく飛ぶ紙ひこうきだゾ

115.TitleJapanese: クレヨンしんちゃん オラたちの恐竜日記
115.SummaryJapanese: 野ばら家の愛犬シロと「小さな恐竜」の友情を描いています。二人の絆が、しんのすけと草壁防衛隊の成長を促します。

1.TitleEnglish: Running an Errand / Mamas Mornings are Busy / Doodling
1.SummaryEnglish: Misae forgets to buy some ingredients for dinner that she is cooking for a special guest (a client of Hiroshi), so she asks Shin to go get them for her. But Shin makes this task more complicated than it should. It was later revealed that Hiroshi's client had to cancel the dinner. Shin-chan acts lazy to wake up and go to school because of which, he misses his bus all the time. Misae gets angry on him. Shin-chan and his friends learn drawing in school. Shin-chan finds faults in others, but fails in it himself. His teacher helps him draw a plane.
1.TitleJapanese: おつかいに行くゾ / ママの朝は忙しいゾ / お絵かきするゾ

2.TitleEnglish: Tricycles are Fun / My Stomach Is Going to Burst / A Nightmare for Dad
2.SummaryEnglish: After much hesitation, Misae gives Shin a tricycle to play with. When he accidentally drops it into a dirty lake, Misae tries to find it. While this is happening, Shin runs off, making Misae think that she's been a bad parent, but it's revealed that Shin ran off because "Action Mask" was starting. Shin-chan has an upset stomach as he's not gone to the toilet for 3 days. The teachers give him medicine and he gets well. Shin-chan goes to a restaurant with Hiroshi as Misae is not home, but Hiroshi finds it tedious being with Shin-chan and is relieved when Misae returns.
2.TitleJapanese: 三輪車は楽しいゾ / お腹がパンパン痛いゾ / 父ちゃんだって大変だゾ

3.TitleEnglish: Watching Action Mask / School Lunch is Fun / Going to the Dentist
3.SummaryEnglish: When he fails to reach home by his curfew, Misae punishes Shin by making him sit out on the porch, causing him to miss out on "Action Mask". Shin tries all sorts of ways to get into the house, until he discovers a loophole and goes to watch it at Nene's house instead. All the food containers fall on the ground because of Shin-chan, so Kazama makes an excuse, but later realizes there is more food. Misae takes Shin-chan to the dentist to get his cavities treated. After coming home, he continues eating junk food, which annoys her.
3.TitleJapanese: アクション仮面を見るゾ / 給食は楽しいゾ / 歯医者に行くゾ

4.TitleEnglish: The Sunflower Class Gang / Going on a Picnic
4.SummaryEnglish: The principal visits the students. Shin-chan asks the principal to sing a song. He kicks an empty can on a car, but the principal saves him. Shin-chan helps Misae prepare food for the picnic. Shin-chan keeps some snacks with him and the lunch box on the boot of the car. After Shin-chan and his parents reach the picnic spot, Misae finds out that the lunch box was kept on the boot of the car.
4.TitleJapanese: 任侠ひまわり組だゾ / ピクニックに行くゾその1 / ピクニックに行くゾその2

5.TitleEnglish: Going to the Movies / A Good Boy's Present / Lending a Hand
5.SummaryEnglish: Misae and Shin-chan go for a movie in a theatre, but Shin-chan disturbs her and everyone watching the film. As a result, she is forced to leave. Yoshinaga asks Shin-chan to be good by keeping the surrounding clean, as a birthday gift. Everyone get amazed with Shin-chan's behaviour. Shin-chan wakes his father for food and acts stubborn with him. He drops the entire juice on the ground.
5.TitleJapanese: 映画に行くゾ / よい子のプレゼントだゾ / お手伝いするゾ

6.TitleEnglish: Tidying Up / Raising Tadpoles / Bathing with Mom
6.SummaryEnglish: Shin-chan helps Misae in the house work, but draws pictures on the walls and on his and Misae's face with the permanent marker when Misae falls asleep. Hiroshi fails to control his laughter. Shin-chan and other students learn about tadpoles in school. Masao and Kazama bring tadpoles school. Yoshinaga puts the tadpoles into the pond after knowing about their life when they grow up. Shin takes a bath with Misae because Hiroshi had to work late. In the process, Misae has to refill the bath tub multiple times because Shin kept putting things in (ex. a beer Hiroshi most likely left for his bath, mud or dirt). In the end, Shin pees in the tub and Misae forces Shin to take a shower, in the process Shin knocks down Misae's new expensive "SAKIO" shampoo and it spills in the drain; Shin then turns the water on.
6.TitleJapanese: 整理しちゃうゾ / おまたじゃくしを飼うゾ / 母ちゃんとお風呂だゾ

7.TitleEnglish: Disaster Drills Are a Nightmare / I found a Puppy / His Name is Shiro
7.SummaryEnglish: Yoshinaga trains the students about the evacuation process. Shin-chan uses the extinguisher and blows off the fire. Everyone feel proud of him. Shin-chan finds an unknown puppy and takes him home. He hides it from his mother, but she realizes and scolds him. Misae doesn't let the puppy stay in the house but as Shin-chan gets attached to it, they keep it and name it Shiro.
7.TitleJapanese: ひなん訓練は大変だゾ / 小犬を拾ったゾ / 名前はシロだゾ

8.TitleEnglish: Going for a Walk with Shiro / Building Shiro's House / I Hate Green Peppers
8.SummaryEnglish: Shin-chan plays with Shiro and takes him for a walk. Shiro eats all the meat that was kept for dinner, leaving Misae and Shin-chan with nothing to eat. Hiroshi creates a dog house for Shiro but Misae spoils it, so they buy a readymade dog house. Shin-chan gets engrossed in the TV that he hardly eats his food. Misae forces Shin-chan to eat capsicum but he refuses and gives it to Shiro.
8.TitleJapanese: シロと散歩に行くゾ / シロの家を作るゾ / ピーマンは嫌いだゾ

9.TitleEnglish: Not Getting in Dads Way / Playing with Clay / Standing and Reading in the Bookstore
9.SummaryEnglish: Misae manages to stop Shin-chan from disturbing Hiroshi. After finishing his work, Hiroshi plays with Shin-chan, but unknowingly, Shin-chan ruins Hiroshi's work. Yoshinaga teaches the children to create stuff with clay. Shin-chan borrows clay from Yoshinaga and creates a giraffe. Shin-chan goes to a book shop and reads comic books but doesn't take any. He finally leaves with his mother.
9.TitleJapanese: 父ちゃんのジャマはしないゾ / 粘土で遊んじゃうゾ / 本屋で立ち読みだゾ

10.TitleEnglish: A College Girl is My Friend / I Want a High-end Swimsuit / It's Pool Time
10.SummaryEnglish: Shin-chan wears his swim suit and goes to school. Yoshinaga teaches the children how to swim. Shin-chan floats in the water like Shiro. Kazama challenges Shin-chan in a swimming competition but loses it. He feels ashamed of himself and decides to take training from Shiro. The principal promotes Yoshinaga on basis her work. Shin-chan reaches home and falls asleep.
10.TitleJapanese: 女子大生はお友達だゾ / ハイグレ水着が欲しいゾ / プールの時間だゾ

11.TitleEnglish: Feeding Shiro / Fighting Couples are Troublesome / A Parent-child Dragnet
11.SummaryEnglish: Misae gets dog food from the market for Shiro. But Shin-chan forgets feeding Shiro and due to hunger, he eats Misae's dress. Misae scolds Shin-chan for watching TV and not doing his homework, but Hiroshi pampers Shin-chan. Hence, Misae gets angry on him. The students and their parents go on a family picnic organized by the school. They involve themselves in fishing and have a great time.
11.TitleJapanese: シロにエサをあげるゾ / 夫婦ゲンカは大変だゾ / 親子で地引き網だゾ

12.TitleEnglish: Going to the Barbershop / Protecting My Treasure / Filming a Video
12.SummaryEnglish: Hiroshi and Shin-chan go to the salon for a haircut. The hair stylist leaves the job because of Shin-chan's mischief. Hiroshi and Shin-chan get kicked out. All the students talk about the treasures they have. Shin-chan appoints himself as Masao's bodyguard and protects him wherever he goes. Hiroshi and Misae purchase a camera. Hiroshi creates a realistic video of Misae and Shin-chan together.
12.TitleJapanese: 床屋さんへ行くゾ / 宝物はオラが守るゾ / ビデオで撮影するゾ

13.TitleEnglish: Sea Water Baths are Fun / Staying at a Luxurious Hotel / The Road Home is Long
13.SummaryEnglish: Hiroshi, Misae and Shin-chan go to Sea Side Hotel for a holiday. Shin-chan acts stubborn and eats a lot of ice cream using the key of the room and catches cold. Hiroshi, Misae and Shin-chan leave from Sea Side Hotel to go home and get stuck in traffic. After being stranded for so long and reaching home at 3am, Misae and Hiroshi get very tired but Shin-chan stays fresh.
13.TitleJapanese: 海水浴は楽しいゾ / 豪華ホテルに泊まるゾ / 帰り道は遠いゾ

14.TitleEnglish: Mommy's Nap / Having an Ego / This time, Were Doing Fireworks
14.SummaryEnglish: Shin-chan plays with Shiro so that his mother can get some sleep. When Misae wakes up, she finds Shin-chan fast to sleep in Shiro's house. Shin-chan goes for English tutions. The teacher gets annoyed with Shin-chan and sends him home with the frog puppet. Shin-chan goes shopping with his mom and purchases crackers. He burns the sparklers on the gas stove but Hiroshi quickly blows it off.
14.TitleJapanese: 母ちゃんの昼寝だゾ / エーゴしちゃうゾ / 今度は花火をやるゾ

15.TitleEnglish: Riding the Train / Rode the Train / Choosing a Sento
15.SummaryEnglish: Shin-chan and his mother go to the station. While waiting for the train to arrive, Shin-chan forces his mother to take him to the washroom but doesn't go. Finally, they go home in a taxi. Misae and Shin-chan board the train to go to the departmental store but forget their shoes in the train. They get late to reach the store.
15.TitleJapanese: 電車に乗るゾ / 電車に乗ったゾ / 銭湯で遊んじゃうゾ

16.TitleEnglish: Mommy's Nursing / Playing with a Bully / Going to a Temple Festival
16.SummaryEnglish: Shin-chan helps his mother get well by filling the ice bag with water but forgets to close it because of which, the rooms gets flooded. Shin-chan and Masao go into the park to play. Shin-chan bravely chases away Takeshi who snatches food from other children. Shin-chan spends his parent's money on food and games at a fair. They end their day by watching fireworks.
16.TitleJapanese: 母ちゃんの看病だゾ / いじめっ子と遊ぶゾ / 縁日に行くゾ

17.TitleEnglish: Encountering Action Mask / Yoshinaga-sensei's Date / The Forgotten Shiro
17.SummaryEnglish: Shin-chan and his parents watch Action Mask live. Shin-chan feels glad on meeting Action Mask and getting an autograph from him. Yoshinaga reaches the venue quite early to meet a client. Till then, Shin-chan comes and annoys her. Hiroshi invites her for tea and snacks. Misae prepares variety of cuisines, as Shin-chan fulfils his responsibility of giving bath to Shiro.
17.TitleJapanese: アクション仮面に会うゾ / よしなが先生のデートだゾ / 忘れられたシロだゾ

18.TitleEnglish: Doing Baseball with Daddy / Nene-chan's Mama is Kind / Grandfather is Coming
18.SummaryEnglish: Hiroshi decides to train Shin-chan to be a baseball player. He begins his training but takes Shiro along with him instead of Shin-chan. Shin-chan meets Nene-chan's mother and frustrates her. Nene-chan cries on seeing her mother yell, but Shin-chan doesn't bother. On Shin-chan's grandparent's arrival, Misae prepares a variety of cuisine. Shin-chan enjoys the company of his grandfather.
18.TitleJapanese: 父ちゃんと野球するゾ / ネネちゃんのママは優しいゾ / じいちゃんが来たゾ

19.TitleEnglish: A Typhoon Comes Around / Ending Up In A Duel / Issuing a Letter
19.SummaryEnglish: Misae and Shin-chan stay in door due to a bad weather. Hiroshi returns from work and stays out, as they all fall asleep. The senior students ask Shin-chan to come after school with his team to play, but Shin-chan acts lazy. The senior students cry over it. Shin-chan writes a letter to Misae which states that Shin-chan loves his mother a lot. Misae gets emotional on reading it.
19.TitleJapanese: 台風がやってくるゾ / 決闘しちゃうゾ / お手紙を出すゾ

20.TitleEnglish: After Meal Toothpaste / Wet The Bed 3 Times / Dancing the Blues
20.SummaryEnglish: After finishing his lunch, Shin-chan brushes his teeth with new toothpaste. His mother beats him for eating junk food after brushing and makes him brush his teeth again. Yoshinaga trains the students to dance for the sports day. As Matsuzaka and Yoshinaga go to meet the principal, Kazama takes lead, but Shin-chan does his own steps.
20.TitleJapanese: 食後のハミガキだゾ/ おねしょ3連発だゾ / ブルースでおどるゾ

21.TitleEnglish: Doing My Best In Sports Day / Running With Mommy / Winning a Relay
21.SummaryEnglish: On the sports day, Shin-chan begins marching well, but forgets his steps. All the students get confused and follow Shin-chan. During the sports day, the children take a break before the parent-child race. Misae and Shin-chan begin their race but Shin-chan ruins it. In an interclass relay race, Shin-chan races Kawamura and wins it. The Sunflower group praises Shin-chan for that.
21.TitleJapanese: 運動会でがんばるゾ / 母ちゃんと走るゾ / リレーで勝負だゾ

22.TitleEnglish: Hand-to-Hand Fighting with Mommy / Playing with Soap Bubbles / The Bookstore Once Again
22.SummaryEnglish: Misae doesn't let Shin-chan in, but he enters anyhow and watches Action Mask. Later, he hides in the washroom to escape Misae's scolding. Shin-chan challenges Kazama to make a big bubble out of the soap water that his mother made for him and wins it. Shin-chan buys 2 magazines and forgets the change at the counter. The cashier runs after him to return it but Shin-chan fails to understand.
22.TitleJapanese: 母ちゃんと格闘だゾ / シャボン玉で遊ぶゾ / またまた本屋さんだゾ

23.TitleEnglish: The Password is Misae / Competing with Stilts / I go to pick up Dad!
23.SummaryEnglish: Shin-chan decides a code for him and his mother as she goes out. Shin-chan makes the courier man utter the code and pesters him. Yoshinaga brings stilts for the kids to play. Kawamura and Kazama give up, but Shin-chan continues performing stunts on the stilts. Shin-chan and Misae go to the station to pick Hiroshi as he doesn't have an umbrella. They decide to get drenched and enjoy the showers.
23.TitleJapanese: 合言葉はみさえだゾ / 竹馬で競争するゾ / とーちゃんのオムカエだゾ

24.TitleEnglish: A Female College Students Work is Hard / I am Playing in a Ddrama / My Parents are Fighting
24.SummaryEnglish: Shin-chan gives a hand-written note to purchase a burger. The manager yells at the girl and makes her pay for it. Shin-chan brings his friends along to eat burgers with the hand-written notes. Shin-chan plays the role of a good man in an act at school by helping a bird and gets a gift in return. He gets confused with the gifts and says what he is not supposed to, but the audience enjoy the act.
24.TitleJapanese: 女子大生バイトはつらいゾ / オラがお芝居するゾ / 夫婦ゲンカのチューサイだゾ

25.TitleEnglish: Duel with the Cockroach / Body check time! / Cleaning Daddy's Car
25.SummaryEnglish: Misae seeks help from Shin-chan to look out for a cockroach and chase it away. After a long struggle, they fail to get hold of the cockroach. Shin-chan helps Hiroshi in washing the car and scrapes the paint. After they finish with the wash, Misae ends up putting a scratch on the car with her bicycle.
25.TitleJapanese: ゴキブリさんと決闘だゾ / 身体測定の時間だゾ / とーちゃんと車のお掃除だゾ

26.TitleEnglish: Lost at the Department Store / Cleaning the hen-house / Shichi-Go-San day
26.SummaryEnglish: Shin-chan joins his mother at the departmental store and realises that he is lost at the store. He seeks help from the staff. Shin-chan and his friends clean the poultry farm. Shin-chan reaches home and sits on the eggs to get chicks out of it. Shin-chan visits the temple with his parents and prays that Misae gives him choco chips instead of capsicum.
26.TitleJapanese: デパートで迷子だゾ / ニワトリ小屋のソージだゾ / オラの七五三だゾ

27.TitleEnglish: Prevent a Cold / Helping Out Yoshinaga-sensei / Buying Sweet Potatoes
27.SummaryEnglish: Shin-chan falls sick. So, his mother gets him some medicines and teaches him how to gargle his mouth but he acts mischievous. Shin-chan and Nene-chan meet Yoshinaga. Shin-chan troubles her by taking her belongings and later asks for forgiveness from her. Shin-chan purchases sweet potatoes for his mother from a vendor and decides to purchase it every time.
27.TitleJapanese: カゼの予防はウガイだゾ / よしなが先生のお手伝いだゾ / ヤキイモを買うゾ

28.TitleEnglish: A Hospital Visit / Hide-and-sneak / Going to the Zoo
28.SummaryEnglish: Shin-chan goes to the hospital with Misae and troubles the nurse. He gets scolded by his mother. Misae feels sorry for not recognizing Mrs Kiko. When Shin-chan plays the hide-and-seek game with his friends, he hides and falls asleep. Later, his friends and Misae go in search of him. Shin-chan gets interviewed when he goes to the zoo with his family. He feels excited to see himself on the TV.
28.TitleJapanese: 病院へお見舞いだゾ / かくれんぼするゾ / 動物園に行くゾ

29.TitleEnglish: The Zoo is Fun / Mommy and the Beauty Salon / I Want my Thanksgiving Gifts
29.SummaryEnglish: Shin-chan goes out for a school trip to the zoo and troubles the animals and his teacher at the zoo. Shin-chan goes to the beauty parlour with his mother and troubles her and the babysitter to play Action games with him. Shin-chan's goes shopping with his parents and demands gifts from them.
29.TitleJapanese: 動物園は楽しいゾ / 母ちゃんと美容院だゾ / おせーぼが欲しいゾ

30.TitleEnglish: Mommy and the Bank / Together with a Policewoman / Going into the Bath with Daddy
30.SummaryEnglish: Shin-chan follows Misae on her way to the bank to withdraw money and harasses her by not letting her withdraw cash. The traffic cops visit Shin-chan's school to teach the students about traffic safety rules. They complain to the teacher about Shin-chan being the naughtiest child in the class. ??
30.TitleJapanese: 母ちゃんと銀行だゾ / 婦警さんと一緒だゾ / 父ちゃんと風呂に入るゾ

31.TitleEnglish: Staying at home with Shiro / Matsuzaka-senseis Secret / Grandfather is Coming Again
31.SummaryEnglish: Misae asks Shin-chan to be at home with Shiro and take care of the house so that she can go out to buy groceries. After Misae returns from the market, she gets furious on seeing the mess in the house. Shin-chan keeps a watch on his school teacher and later tells everyone about Matsuzaka eating free food at the market and gets her embarrassed.
31.TitleJapanese: シロとお留守番だゾ / まつざか先生のヒミツだゾ / じいちゃんがまた来たゾ

32.TitleEnglish: My First Ski / It's fun being at Kazama-kun's house / Action Mask and Xmas
32.SummaryEnglish: Shin-chan and Hiroshi experience a snow storm while skiing, so they return home. Shin-chan visits Kazama's house and gets amazed to see such a beautiful house. Later, he acts mischievous and ends up messing the entire house. Shin-chan meets Action Mask on Christmas day but later, gets to know the fact that it is Hiroshi dressed up as Action Mask and feels sad.
32.TitleJapanese: オラの初スキーだゾ / 風間くんちは楽しいゾ / アクション仮面とＸマスだゾ

33.TitleEnglish: Have a Supper / Kite Flying is fun / Lets make a snowman
33.SummaryEnglish: Misae prepares mushroom soup but while having it, Shin-chan begins to play with the food and ends up troubling his mother. Shin-chan and his friends fly kites, but as the strings entangle, they take Hiroshi's help to sort it out. Shin-chan goes out with his father and makes a huge snowman. Later, Shin-chan dresses the snowman with Misae's clothes.
33.TitleJapanese: おゾウニを食べるゾ / たこあげは楽しいゾ / 雪だるまを作るゾ

34.TitleEnglish: Making lunch box is tough / Play Cooking / Helping at the bookstore
34.SummaryEnglish: Shin is helping Misae cook for dinner while making things *way* more complicated. Using the skill Misae just showed him, Shin 'play cooks'.
34.TitleJapanese: お弁当作りは大変だゾ / おままごとするゾ / 本屋さんを手伝うゾ

35.TitleEnglish: I am a Model / A fun hot spring trip / Hot spring for everyone
35.SummaryEnglish: Shin-chan gets the opportunity to become a model for a magazine's ad. After the shoot, Kiko's camera breaks because of Shin-chan's mistake. A person comes to learn swimming from Shin-chan and his parents are worried and run to save Shin-chan and get to know the unknown person was a good man.
35.TitleJapanese: オラが写真のモデルだゾ / 温泉旅行は楽しいゾ / 温泉で混浴だゾ

36.TitleEnglish: Bean Throwing Night / Mummy goes shopping / I love steamboat
36.SummaryEnglish: The students and Yoshinaga throw beans out in the air as a celebration to bring peace and harmony. Shin-chan and Misae go shopping. A sales executive tries hard to make a sale, but Shin-chan troubles Misae and they leave. Shin-chan, Misae and Hiroshi prepare a hot pot meal together. They have dinner and fun at the same time.
36.TitleJapanese: 節分で豆まきだゾ / 網にかかったみさえだゾ / 冬のナベはサイコーだゾ

37.TitleEnglish: I caught a cold / Being a policeman is tough / Karaoke session
37.SummaryEnglish: Shin-chan visits the doctor with his mother to treat his fever and troubles him. The doctor regrets being a child specialist. Shin-chan gets lost and meets a policeman. He troubles the policeman with his questions. Misae finds Shin-chan in the police station and gets happy. Hiroshi, Misae, Shin-chan and Kiko go out for a Karaoke box event. They all sing at the event and have a great time.
37.TitleJapanese: カゼをひいちゃったゾ / おまわりさんは大変だゾ / カラオケで歌うゾ

38.TitleEnglish: Lets buy some roasted red bean / A stay in our school / The night in our School
38.SummaryEnglish: Shin-chan goes to buy groceries for his mother but pesters the shopkeeper with his questions. The students celebrate 'child care day' in school. Yoshinaga plays a documentary for them. In the night, on listening to a horror story, Shin-chan gets restless and wakes Kazama to play with him. Shin-chan falls asleep in the toilet when he goes with Masao.
38.TitleJapanese: たい焼きを買いに行くゾ / おとまり保育だゾ / おとまり保育の夜だゾ

39.TitleEnglish: Keep quiet in the library / Gearing for marathon / Marathon day
39.SummaryEnglish: Shin-chan and Misae visit a library to purchase books for Shin-chan, but he troubles his mother and the librarian by making sounds. Shin-chan, Hiroshi and Misae go out to practise for the marathon, but they find it difficult due to the cold weather. The Rose group and the Sunflower group get into a marathon race. The principal declares Shin-chan as the winner as he helps Masao in his injury.
39.TitleJapanese: 図書館では静かにするゾ / マラソンの練習だゾ / マラソン大会だゾ

40.TitleEnglish: Its a girls festival / Going to swimming school / Training Shiro
40.SummaryEnglish: Shin-chan and his friends go to Nene-chan's house. Nene-chan's mother prepares cake for the kids but Shin-chan ruins it. Misae sends Shin-chan to the swimming school to learn swimming and feels happy to see Shin-chan swim by himself. Shin-chan trains Shiro to be a circus star but Shiro flops at the time of the presentation. Shin-chan gets upset but he tries again.
40.TitleJapanese: おひなまつりだゾ / スイミングスクールへ行くゾ / シロに芸を仕込むゾ

41.TitleEnglish: I play Badminton / Going on a field trip / Take a walk with Shiro
41.SummaryEnglish: Shin-chan plays badminton with Hiroshi and Misae. But during the game, Misae and Hiroshi end up fighting with each other. The students go on a study tour to the bread factory. Shin-chan ends up troubling Yoshinaga during their journey. Shin-chan troubles Misae by messing up the house. Later, when Shiro and Shin-chan go for a walk, they meet Kawamura and compare his dog with Shiro.
41.TitleJapanese: バトミントンするゾ / 社会見学に行くゾ / 名犬シロと散歩だゾ

42.TitleEnglish: Ordering pizza delivery / My friends hamster / Sunning my beddings
42.SummaryEnglish: Shin-chan drops the pizza that Misae orders and does not tell her about it. She relishes the pizza and realises later that it was the same pizza. Masao brings a rat to school. Shin-chan frightens Yoshinaga with it, so she takes help from Matsuzaka and gets rid of it. Shin-chan gets a nightmare of a monster and wets his bed. Next morning, Shin-chan is made to dry his mattress.
42.TitleJapanese: 出前ピザをたのむゾ / マサオ君のハムスターだゾ / おフトンをほすゾ

43.SummaryEnglish: While playing soccer, Kawamura underestimates Shin-chan and his friends but fails to score a goal. He cries and leaves the ground. Both the groups compete in a soccer match. The Sunflower team wins the match by scoring at the penalty shootouts. Misae, Shin-chan and Hiroshi prepare themselves for the earthquake. But fall asleep when it actually takes place.
43.TitleJapanese: サッカーの練習だゾ / サッカー大会だゾ / 地震が来たゾ

44.TitleEnglish: A place for cherry blossom / Cherry blossom is fun / A Visit to daddy's office
44.SummaryEnglish: A man blocks a place for him to sleep and does not let the children in that area. Later, the children take over. So he convinces the kids by giving them ice cream to get his place back. Misae and Shin-chan go to Hiroshi's office to deliver some papers. On reaching the office, Shin-chan and Misae are being greeted by Hiroshi's colleagues. Shin-chan feels happy to see his dad work so hard.
44.TitleJapanese: お花見の場所とりだゾ / お花見は楽しいゾ / 父ちゃんの会社へ行くゾ

45.TitleEnglish: Sowing Seeds / Spending at the Grocery Store / A Face Without Eyebrows
45.SummaryEnglish: Yoshinaga teaches the students how to sow seeds. Shin-chan gets the water pipe and waters the seeds that are sown. Misae sends Shin-chan with a list of grocery items but loses it. He returns home with vegetables of his choice and gets scolding from his mother. Shin-chan observes his dad shaving and shaves off his one eyebrow. He goes out to escape from his mother's scolding.
45.TitleJapanese: たねまきをするゾ / 八百屋さんへおつかいだゾ / マユゲなしの顔だゾ

46.TitleEnglish: Daddy is drank / I am a detective / Go shopping with mummy
46.SummaryEnglish: Shin-chan decides to help Maso to search his Crayon. After a long investigation, Shin-chan remembers Maso lending him the Crayon and he returns it back to Maso. Shin-chan is excited to go shopping with his mother. Later, he is confused[clarification needed] to pick snacks for himself and ends up picking and expensive snack for himself.
46.TitleJapanese: よっぱらい父ちゃんだゾ / オラは名探偵だゾ / 母ちゃんと買物だゾ

47.TitleEnglish: festival / Kicking tin cans / Elevator girl
47.SummaryEnglish: Hiroshi purchases carp streamer for his son and gives Shin-chan a surprise. Shin-chan borrows a can from his principle to play kick can with his friends. They get Yoshinaga out of the game. She gets furious. Shin-chan gets stuck in the elevator when he goes shopping with his parents. After a long wait, they finally get their son back.
47.TitleJapanese: 鯉のぼりをあげるゾ / カンケリをするゾ / エレベーターガールと一緒だゾ

48.TitleEnglish: Mothers strained back! / The saleslady from hell / Mothers day
48.SummaryEnglish: Shin-chan goes along with his mother to the doctor as she has a backache, but troubles the doctor there. Shin-chan meets an aunt while playing whom he has seen before on TV. Shin-chan troubles the sales woman and gets her arrested by the police. Shin-chan makes a mother's day card for his mother and also helps her in making a cake. Hiroshi gets amazed to see Shin-chan taking care of Misae.
48.TitleJapanese: ぎっくり腰の母ちゃんだゾ / 地獄のセールスレディだゾ / きょうは母の日だゾ

49.TitleEnglish: Setting out for a picnic / An incident during picnic / Do not play with fire!
49.SummaryEnglish: Shin-chan troubles Yoshinaga during a school trip. Later, when Kazama and Shin-chan go to the washroom, Shin-chan drops Kazama's handkerchief and makes him cry. During the trip, Shin-chan and his friends walk towards the jungle and lose their way. They meet Yoshinaga and feel safe.
49.TitleJapanese: 遠足へ出発だゾ / 遠足でソーナンだゾ / 火遊びはこわいゾ

50.TitleEnglish: I hate to keep toys / Night time is adults world / My book is bestseller
50.SummaryEnglish: Misae decides to throw Shin-chan's toys out of the house. So, Shin-chan takes his toys and hides it at Shinobu's place. Shin-chan wakes up from his sleep and finds his parents having chocolate chips without him. Misae tries to put Shin-chan to sleep but he doesn't asleep again. Shin-chan visits the bookstore to sell his book and takes the money from the customer who purchases his book.
50.TitleJapanese: おかたづけは苦手だゾ / 夜は大人の時間だゾ / オラの本はベストセラーだゾ

51.TitleEnglish: Cutting grass / Teacher is sick / Visiting my teacher
51.SummaryEnglish: While Shin-chan waits for his mother to come to pick him up, Yoshinaga falls ill. Shin-Chan seeks help from Matsuzaka. The Principal takes few students to meet Yoshinaga at the hospital. After they reach the hospital, they greet her and give her best wishes to get well soon.
51.TitleJapanese: 草むしりを手伝うゾ / よしなが先生が急病だゾ / よしなが先生のお見舞いだゾ

52.TitleEnglish: I hate to throw trash / Saleslady from Hell taking revenge / Revolving Sushi
52.SummaryEnglish: While searching for a garbage van, Shin-chan tears the garbage bag and messes up the entire place. The sales executive follows Shin-chan to force him to buy the book but Shin-chan manages to escape from there. Hiroshi takes his family out for lunch. Shin-chan messes the entire place and gets his parents embarrassed.
52.TitleJapanese: ゴミ捨ても大変だゾ / 帰ってきた地獄のセールスレディだゾ / 回転ずしを食べるゾ

1.TitleEnglish: Helping someone in trouble / Being a carpenter is tough / Shiro is missing
1.SummaryEnglish: Shin-chan decides to help people. He meets a man who asks him the way to Kazama's house. But Shin-chan pesters him. Matsuzaka and Yoshinaga build a wooden house for the kids to play. But Shin-chan kicks the football and knocks down the new house. Shiro leaves the house as Shin-chan troubles him. Shin-chan gets very worried about Shiro. However, Shiro returns home in the night.
1.TitleJapanese: こまっている人を助けるゾ / 大工仕事は大変だゾ / シロが行方不明だゾ

2.TitleEnglish: Asking a politician questions / Listening to big sister / Today is Fathers Day
2.SummaryEnglish: Shin-chan meets a politician at an old age home and leads him into trouble before the media by asking him questions. Fumie visits Shin-chan to take care of him in Misae's absence. Fumie lies to Shin-chan that she is his sister and makes him behave as per her. Misae and Shin-chan forget that it is Father's day and make Hiroshi do their work. But later, they get gifts for him and make him happy.
2.TitleJapanese: 政治家に質問だゾ / おねえ様に服従だゾ / きょうは父の日だゾ

3.TitleEnglish: Man can cook / Mummy got a toothache / Wedding outfit adventure
3.SummaryEnglish: Hiroshi and Shin-chan prepare food together. Shin-chan adds some orange juice in the food for fun, which enhances the flavor of the meal. Misae suffers from a toothache and hides it from Shin-chan. On knowing about it, Shin-chan takes Misae to the dentist. Keiko, Shin-chan, and Misae visit a store to purchase a wedding gown. Keiko meets her neighbor and invites him to her wedding party.
3.TitleJapanese: 男の料理を作るゾ / 母ちゃんの歯痛だゾ / 結婚衣装を見に行くゾ

4.TitleEnglish: Playing with a bully again / Attending a wedding ceremony / A wedding party
4.SummaryEnglish: Takeshi asks Shin-chan and Suzuki to take him to Masao's house. But, Shin-chan takes him to his house where Takeshi's mother scolds Takeshi. Hiroshi and his family reach for the nuptial before the bride and the groom.
4.TitleJapanese: いじめっ子と又遊ぶゾ / 結婚式に出席するゾ / 結婚パーティーだゾ

5.TitleEnglish: I cant sleep / Pool cleaning is fun / We Won a Trip to Guam
5.SummaryEnglish: Shin-chan watches a horror show before going to bed and gets petrified in the night. At the end, Shin-chan sleeps with Hiroshi. The principal, Matsuzaka, and Yoshinaga decide to clean the swimming pool. Shin-chan also joins them in cleaning. Misae, Hiroshi, and Shin-chan win a long trip as a gift for the quiz played. The family practice speaking in English as they will be traveling by plane.
5.TitleJapanese: こわくて眠れないゾ / プール掃除で遊んじゃうゾ / グァム旅行が当たったゾ

6.TitleEnglish: Balloons Balloons / I found a Wallet / I go sightseeing with Granddad!
6.SummaryEnglish: Shin-chan insists his mother blow balloons for him and doesn't let her relax. So, Misae blows all the balloons and plays with Shin-chan. Shin-chan and Nene-chan find a purse fallen on the ground. Shin-chan gets a reward for returning his mother's purse to her. Shin-chan's grandparents take Shin-chan for a sightseeing in Tokyo. They all enjoy themselves and return home in the evening.
6.TitleJapanese: 風船をふくらますゾ / おサイフを拾ったゾ / じいちゃんと東京見物だゾ

7.TitleEnglish: Eating Shaved Ice Dessert / Injection for Shiro / Family camping
7.SummaryEnglish: As it is hot, Shin-chan forces Misae to buy ice crushers. He eats a lot of ice candies and upsets his stomach. Shin-chan and Kawamura take their dogs for a vaccination. Shiro, courageously, steps forward and gets himself injected. Shin-chan and his family go camping. They set a tent and cook food. They stay awake in the night as it rains. And in the morning, they all fall asleep.
7.TitleJapanese: かき氷を食べるゾ / シロのお注射だゾ / 家族でキャンプだゾ

8.TitleEnglish: The next big time singer / Continue drawing the track / What a hot night
8.SummaryEnglish: Misae takes Shin-chan to a music school to train him, but she gets angry on the teacher and returns home. Shin-chan and his friends decide to play the engine game and draw tracks on the road. Kazama returns home while the rest enjoy the game. As it is very hot, the family convince themselves and sleep under one fan. But in the night, the fan stops working and a mosquito disturbs them.
8.TitleJapanese: 将来は人気歌手だゾ / 線路は続いちゃうゾ / 暑い暑い熱帯夜だゾ

9.TitleEnglish: Miss Yoshinagas private life / The last sales lady / Buying air-con
9.SummaryEnglish: Shin-chan stays at Yoshinaga's house checks her room to find something different but Yoshinaga stops him. A sales girl, Urima follows Shin-chan to sell a set of books and CDs to Misae. She loses a track of Shin-chan and gives up. Misae, Hiroshi, and Shin-chan decide to buy an A/C. But Misae gets to know that the price of the A/C will reduce after a year. So, she drops the idea of buying it.
9.TitleJapanese: よしなが先生の私生活だゾ / 最後のセールスレディだゾ / エアコンを買うゾ

10.TitleEnglish: To the petrol station / Watermelon craze / How to cut watermelon
10.SummaryEnglish: Hiroshi and Shin-chan go to a petrol pump to fill fuel. Shin-chan troubles the attendant and gets her sacked out from her job. While Shin-chan's grandfather sends watermelons for Shin-chan, Misae and Hiroshi also bring watermelons home. They all have watermelon for dinner. The family plays 'break the watermelon game'. Shin-chan succeeds in breaking the watermelon and wins the game.
10.TitleJapanese: ガソリンスタンドへ行くゾ / スイカがいっぱいだゾ / スイカ割りをやるゾ

11.TitleEnglish: Its a date with Miss Matsuzaka! / Practicing sumo! / I do my best at sumo!
11.SummaryEnglish: Shin-chan interrupts Matsuzaka and her boyfriend's meeting. So, Matsuzaka takes Shin-chan along with her and returns home. Hiroshi trains Shin-chan for a sumo wrestling match held for the kids. Shin-chan drops the washed clothes rack on the ground, for which Hiroshi gets a beating. Shin-chan gets into a competition with a strong trained child wrestler, Tarau and wins the match.
11.TitleJapanese: まつざか先生のデートだゾ / お相撲のけいこだゾ / 相撲大会でガンバるゾ

12.TitleEnglish: I go to the police station! / I go to collect insects! / Cleaning up with Mom!
12.SummaryEnglish: Hiroshi and Shin-chan go to the police station to renew Hiroshi's driving license. Shin-chan annoys the lady officer in charge with his mischief. Shin-chan, Masao, and Bo-chan go on a trek to find insects. Shin-chan kicks a tree and fortunately, finds an insect. Hiroshi complains about the mess in the house. So, the next day, Misae and Shin-chan clean the house and surprise Hiroshi.
12.TitleJapanese: ケーサツへ行くゾ / 昆虫採集に行くゾ / 母ちゃんとおソージだゾ

13.TitleEnglish: Damaged by a typhoon! / I confront the girl who leads this group of bad kids! / I beat you at dodge ball!
13.SummaryEnglish: Due to heavy rains, Misae shifts the things from the ground floor to the first floor. But she forgets to close the tap, which results in a flood. Shin-chan plays with the girls from the Saitama group. The rivals of the Saitama group find the girls immature and return. Shin-chan and his friends have a dodgeball competition with the senior students. Shin-chan and his friends win the match.
13.TitleJapanese: 台風で水害だゾ / スケバンと対決だゾ / ドッジボールで勝負だゾ

14.TitleEnglish: OLA is a detective! / An ambulance at the hospital! / Hospitals favorite!
14.SummaryEnglish: Shin-chan and his friends play the detective game and help Yoshinaga find her lost sandal that was stolen by a dog. Shin-chan eats a lot of snacks in the night and complains about pain in his stomach. So, Hiroshi and Misae take him to the hospital in an ambulance and admit him. The other patients give Shin-chan sweets as a gift on his farewell. Shin-chan eats the sweets and falls sick again.
14.TitleJapanese: オラは刑事さんだゾ / 救急車で入院だゾ / 病院でも人気者だゾ

15.TitleEnglish: Welcome newlyweds! / Training for a race! / I shoot an athletic meet on video!
15.SummaryEnglish: Keiko meets Shin-chan in Misae's absence and spends time with Shin-chan while waiting for Misae. On a Sunday, Hiroshi and Misae train Shin-chan for a race. But Shin-chan does not pay attention. During Shin-chan's sports event, Hiroshi shoots a video of Shin-chan to show Shin-chan's grandparents. But Misae captures Action Mask video in the cassette and puts Hiroshi's effort in vain.
15.TitleJapanese: 新婚さんいらっしゃいだゾ / かけっこの特訓だゾ / 運動会のビデオ撮影だゾ

16.TitleEnglish: Mom is on a diet! / I go to the sports club! / Dad lost his eyebrows!
16.SummaryEnglish: Misae tries hard to lose weight and plans a diet. But she fails to resist her food craving and eats stomach full. The school organizes an athletic training for its students. At the end, all the students get a pack of snacks as a reward for completing the given task. While Hiroshi sleeps, Shin-chan trims Hiroshi's eyebrows. Later, Misae and Shin-chan come up with ideas to rectify the problem.
16.TitleJapanese: 母ちゃんのダイエットだゾ / アスレチックするゾ / 父ちゃんのマユゲがないゾ

17.TitleEnglish: I carry a portable shrine! / I take part in a flea market! / I do business at the flea market!
17.SummaryEnglish: Shin-chan and his group create a box house and decorate it with flowers, animal pictures, and Shin-chan's action robot for a competition. Misae, Shin-chan, and Hiroshi segregate the unwanted things present in the house that can be sold in a flea market and find Shin-chan's baby toys. Misae, Keiko, and Shin-chan put up a stall to sell their things. Shin-chan barters his old toys for better ones.
17.TitleJapanese: おみこしをかつぐゾ / フリーマーケットに参加だゾ / フリーマーケットで商売だゾ

18.TitleEnglish: I fix the drain spout! / I love sushi! / My brother, the chickee!
18.SummaryEnglish: Hiroshi climbs the roof to repair the broken pipe. He loses his balance because of Shin-chan's mischief and hangs on the pipe. Shin-chan goes to Nene-chan's house for lunch and finishes 50 percent of the food alone. Moeko consoles herself by singing and dancing. Shin-chan finds a left out chick and takes it home. He goes to return the chick back, but the vendor gifts it to him.
18.TitleJapanese: 雨どいの修理だゾ / 特上寿司は好みだゾ / オラの弟はヒヨコだゾ

19.TitleEnglish: I find a chicken! / I help with the washing! / I go to the newlyweds home!
19.SummaryEnglish: Shin-chan takes his chick to school and leaves it in the poultry farm. The chicks and the hen go out from the farm and return on their own. Misae dries the clothes in the house, as it rains. Later, when it gets sunny, she washes all the dirty clothes with Shin-chan's help. Keiko invites Misae and her family to her new house. Shin-chan finds a room with toys and has fun playing with Satoshi.
19.TitleJapanese: ニワトリさんを探すゾ / お洗濯を手伝うゾ / 新婚さんちへ行くゾ

20.TitleEnglish: Lets play school! / Lets have a BBQ! / Dad is tired!
20.SummaryEnglish: As Misae goes out, Fumie takes care of Shin-chan and teaches him maths while playing the school game. Shin-chan eats Masao's steak and troubles him while preparing barbecue. So, he gives Masao his share of corn and also entertains him. Hiroshi returns home tired and worried about his work and decides to quit his job. But on seeing Shin-chan, he realizes that he should continue with his job.
20.TitleJapanese: 学校ごっこをするゾ / バーベキューするゾ / 父ちゃんはお疲れだゾ

21.TitleEnglish: Mom in her middy and skirt! / I play with the model house! / I select a family photo!
21.SummaryEnglish: Misae finds her school uniform and wears it. The principal notices Misae and embarrasses her. Sumitakunaru sets her house with the latest technology in the hope of getting a good customer. But Shin-chan and the other kids chase the customer away. Misae and Hiroshi visit the photo studio to click a family picture.But, Shin-chan ruins the pictures with his mischievous poses.
21.TitleJapanese: セーラー服母ちゃんだゾ / モデルハウスで遊ぶゾ / 家族写真をとるゾ

22.TitleEnglish: I try my hand at sewing! / I hate getting shots! / Taking care of the client!
22.SummaryEnglish: Shin-chan learns the art of stitching. And when Misae falls asleep, Shin-chan stitches the clothes from the house. At school, the doctor diverts children's attention so as to vaccinate them. But Shin-chan builds a conversation with the doctor to avoid the injection. Misae prepares food for Kawaguchi on his sudden visit. And after having food, Kawaguchi and Shin-chan play together and have fun.
22.TitleJapanese: ぬい物をするゾ / お注射はキライだゾ / お客様をもてなすゾ

23.TitleEnglish: Dont praise me so much! / Dad really hates cats! / I play at the bookstore again today!
23.SummaryEnglish: Misae appreciates Shin-chan mistakes instead of correcting him so that he changes his behavior. A cat hurts Hiroshi several time and disturbs him while working. In the night, Hiroshi envies the cat's life as he finds it difficult to complete his work. The bookstore owner and Nagamura prepare to welcome the bookstore inspection officer. But a confusion leads them in not getting their bonus.
23.TitleJapanese: ほめ殺しはつらいゾ / 父ちゃんは猫ギライだゾ / 今日も本屋さんで遊ぶゾ

24.TitleEnglish: I eat Chinese noodles! / Im a very talented skater! / The newlyweds fight!
24.SummaryEnglish: When Misae and Shin-chan go to a restaurant to eat noodles, Shin-chan drops the bowl of noodles on the table while pouring it in his bowl. Hiroshi, Misae, and Shin-chan go for ice skating o get some winter exercise. Shin-chan skates with great ease and impresses an ice skating champion. Keiko runs away to the home of her friend Misae for comfort and advice because Satoshi scolds her for a cooking silly quarrel. Later, Satoshi apologizes to Keiko and takes her home back.
24.TitleJapanese: ラーメンを食べるゾ / スケートの天才だゾ / 新婚さんのケンカだゾ

25.TitleEnglish: I Make Some Cookies / Miss Matsuzaka's Marriage Meeting / Elections Are Sure Rough
25.SummaryEnglish: Misae has long dreamed of being a mother who bakes cookies with her child, but things don't go smoothly when Shin-chan is involved. Shin-chan prepares cookies shaped with Misae, Hiroshi and his face. Shin-chan and his family visit the same fancy restaurant that Matsuzaka and her date visits. Matsuzaka tries hard to hide from Shin-chan. But her behavior annoys her date. A politician is giving a speech on the street, asking passersby for their support in the upcoming election, when Shin-chan interrupts him.
25.TitleJapanese: クッキーを作るゾ / まつざか先生のお見合いだゾ / 選挙って大変だゾ

26.TitleEnglish: Knitting a Sweater / Riding a Packed Train / Playing at Dads Office
26.SummaryEnglish: Misae unknits Hiroshi's old sweater to make a new one for him but ends up knitting a sweater for Shiro with the same wool. Hiroshi is on his way to work when he encounters Shin-chan, who is playing detective and has trailed him to the train station. Shin-chan pesters the passengers in the train with his mischief and his talks. Hiroshi brings Shin-chan to his office. Arriving at the office, Hiroshi tells Shin-chan to wait patiently in the lobby till his mother can come and get him. Shin-chan escapes from the recreational room and meets the president of the company and has fun with him.
26.TitleJapanese: セーターを編むゾ / 満員電車に乗るゾ / 父ちゃんの会社で遊ぶゾ

27.TitleEnglish: Ep.79 Fashion Show Adventure / Kindergarten Spring Cleaning / The Sound of New Years Eve
27.SummaryEnglish: Kei invites Misae and Shin-chan to a fashion show, where Shin-chan is chosen by a fashion designer as a last-minute substitute for a child model who is ill. Shin-chan gets nervous and ruins the fashion show. As the year comes to an end, Shin-chan’s class is supposed to clean the school today, but Shin-chan has his own unique approach. Shin-chan has a conversation with his friends in the park about the New Year's eve bell. He stays awake till 12 am to hear the bell and then falls asleep.
27.TitleJapanese: ファッションショーに出るゾ / 幼稚園の大そうじだゾ / 除夜のカネを聞くゾ

28.TitleEnglish: Receiving Red Packets / Shopping With Red Packets Money / Here comes Grandparents!
28.SummaryEnglish: Misae gives Shin-chan a ball instead of a coin on New Year's day. Later, as Misae breaks the ball, she gives him a real coin. Shin-chan goes shopping but doesn't spend his New Year coin. He saves the coin and admires it even in his sleep. Shin-chan’s grandparents arrive for a visit without warning determined to enjoy their grandson, even if it makes Misae’s life more difficult. Shin-chan and his grandfather agree to help Misae in cleaning but add to the mess.
28.TitleJapanese: おとし玉をもらったゾ / おとし玉で買物だゾ / じいちゃん達が来たゾ

29.TitleEnglish: Going for a Ski Trip / The activity after Skiing / My whole family is Skiing
29.SummaryEnglish: The school takes the students and their families for skiing. Matsuzaka doesn't know how to ski but she tries her best. The principal sends everyone back to the hotel to get some rest. Shin-chan and his friends see Matsuzaka performing in a nightclub and join her. The Nohara family is at a ski resort, but Shin-chan causes problems that interfere with his parents’ attempts to ski.
29.TitleJapanese: スキーバス旅行だゾ / アフタースキーだゾ / 家族でスキーだゾ

30.TitleEnglish: Ways to avoid being late / Masao's love / Lets make natto and rice!
30.SummaryEnglish: Shin-chan often oversleeps and misses the school bus. Misae resents having to take him to kindergarten on her bicycle, so she devises a plan and wakes him up. But she receives a call from Yoshinaga telling her that the bus has broken down. Masao has a crush on Megumi, a girl from the other kindergarten class, but he’s too shy to speak to her. Shin-chan is hungry after playing outside, but Misae is entertaining guests and can’t make anything for him. Shin-chan finds it difficult to control his hunger and prepares a meal for himself.
30.TitleJapanese: チコク防止作戦だゾ / マサオくんの恋だゾ / 納豆ゴハンを作るゾ

31.TitleEnglish: Playing at a girls school! / Call me Pencil Shin-chan / Im a impersonator
31.SummaryEnglish: Shin-chan goes to the girls school where the Saitama group girls study without informing Misae. So, he gets scolding from her. Shin-chan and Shiro enter a random house and spends their day there. Later, Misae tells Shin-chan about the new show Pencil Shin-chan. Misae tries to keep Shin-chan away from the craze of the Pencil Shin-chan program but Shin-chan gets busy watching Action Mask.
31.TitleJapanese: 女子高で遊ぶゾ / オラはエンピツしんちゃんだゾ / テレビの口まねだゾ

32.TitleEnglish: The lottery! / Lets go to a funeral! / A snowball fight
32.SummaryEnglish: After reading a magazine horoscope, Misae decides to buy a lottery ticket. Misae, Hiroshi and Shin-chan each dream of what they would do if they won. But Shin-chan receives a jumbo Chocobi packet along with a t-shirt, whereas Misae and Hiroshi do not win anything. The Nohara family has to attend a funeral, and Shin-chan is warned to behave himself. However, he is not quite sure what behavior is required as Shin-chan disturbs everyone by playing the instruments. The two kindergarten classes start a snowball fight, which brings out the personal animosity between Ms. Yoshinaga and Ms. Matsuzaka.
32.TitleJapanese: 宝クジを当てるゾ / おそうしきに行くゾ / 雪合戦で勝負だゾ

33.TitleEnglish: Im changing my hairstyle! / Visiting Kazama-kun at his illness! / The chairman's house is a villa!
33.SummaryEnglish: Misae decides to cut Shin-chan’s hair. She sets up a chair in his room and tells him that they are going to play barbershop. While cutting Shin-chan's hair, Misae shaves a portion of his head bald. So, Misae draws a black spot with the marker to cover it. Shin-chan and Nene go to visit Kazama, who is home sick with a cold. However, Kazama is irritated by Shin-chan’s presence. Shin-chan troubles Kazama and makes him run. As a result, Kazama's body temperature drops down and he feels good. Hiroshi’s boss has just built a new house and holds a housewarming party. The Nohara family attends, but Shin-chan can’t help disrupting the event.
33.TitleJapanese: オラ髪形を変えるゾ / 風間くんをお見舞いするゾ / 課長の家は新築だゾ

34.TitleEnglish: Hatena is a mysterious cat! / Cleaning your ears feels good! / Misae's class reunion
34.SummaryEnglish: Hatena the cat is stealing Shiro’s food. Bo and Shin-chan follow her, trying to figure out where she lives. When Hiroshi doesn’t respond to Misae’s voice, it seems that he needs to have wax removed from his ears. Shin-chan wants his ears cleaned, too. Shin-chan follows Misae to Tokyo for her class reunion, where she get a surprise when she meets her old crush, Mogi.
34.TitleJapanese: ハテナは謎の猫だゾ / 耳ソージは気持ちいいゾ / みさえの同窓会だゾ

35.TitleEnglish: The softball tournament part 1 / The softball tournament part 2 / A divorce at the Nohara house!
35.SummaryEnglish: The principal of the kindergarten proposes an inter-class softball game, but things start to go wrong during practice when a teacher breaks a window. Shin-chan begins the baseball match by batting first. And later, he does a good fielding and gets Kawamura out of the game. A televised debate program prompts a quarrel between Misae and Hiroshi, one that escalates quickly. Can this marriage be saved? What can Shin-chan do? Later, they patch up.
35.TitleJapanese: ソフトボール大会だゾその1 / ソフトボール大会だゾその2 / 野原家のリコンだゾ

36.TitleEnglish: Taking a bath by myself / It's a tricycle race! / Eat at a baikingu!
36.SummaryEnglish: In preparation for bath time, Misae asks Shin-chan to check the temperature of the water, but Shin-chan has trouble accomplishing this all by himself. Bullies called the Black Thunders try to chase Shin-chan and his friends out of the park. Their leader, Wolf, challenges Shin-chan to a tricycle race. Although the group leader wins the challenge, Shin-chan rides the cycle like a bike and impresses everyone. At a posh hotel buffet dinner, the Noharas are ecstatic over the fancy food. Seeing caviar for the first time, Shin-chan makes a unique comment.
36.TitleJapanese: ひとりでお風呂だゾ / 三輪車でレースだゾ / バイキングを食べるゾ

37.TitleEnglish: I enjoy the art in a museum! / Im Kazama-kun! / I entertain the director!
37.SummaryEnglish: When the Noharas visit an art museum, they voice their opinions on the art loudly and frankly, not realizing that the artist is right next to them. Hence, the artist gets frustrated and leaves the museum. Shin-chan and friends decide to play “kindergarten,” with Shin-chan playing Kazama’s role, Nene as the teacher Ms. Yoshinaga, and Kazama as Shin-chan. Hiroshi brings his boss home after work. Unlike the nervous Misae, Shin-chan seems quite relaxed. Will Shin-chan be rude to the boss? Hiroshi and his boss along with Shin-chan have fun together.
37.TitleJapanese: 美術館でゲージツだゾ / オラは風間くんだゾ / 部長さんを接待するゾ

38.TitleEnglish: Dad is sick! / Putting on makeup is fun! / I get a brother!
38.SummaryEnglish: Taking over for Misae who is out buying cold medicine, Shin-chan "takes care of" his sick father, as if Hiroshi isn’t miserable enough already. Shin-chan and Misae show up at the cosmetics counter where Shinobu works part time. Shinobu’s patience wears thin with Shin-chan’s antics. Misae feels ill during dinner. Could Shin-chan soon become a big brother? Hiroshi and Misae ponder this. The next day, Misae goes to the hospital. But she gets to know that it was because of overeating.
38.TitleJapanese: 父ちゃんが病気だゾ / お化粧は楽しいゾ / オラの弟ができたゾ

39.TitleEnglish: Edo Land - Tale of Fire! / Edo Land - Tale of Water! / I go out even though it is windy!
39.SummaryEnglish: The Nohara's win a ticket to Edo Land, a samurai theme park where they can pretend to be feudal lords. Shin-chan enacts a king, Hiroshi a servant and Misae a normal mother. Shin-chan and his family enact common people of the olden times. Hiroshi and Shin-chan fight the goons and save Misae. Shin-chan ignores Misae’s warnings and heads to Masao’s house on a very windy day. Shin-chan, caught in a gust of wind, is unable to get anywhere!
39.TitleJapanese: 大江戸ランド火の巻だゾ / 大江戸ランド水の巻だゾ / 強風でも出かけるゾ

40.TitleEnglish: Flower viewing is dangerous! / A long, tedious conversation is annoying! / I have a craving for Chinese noodles!
40.SummaryEnglish: Shin-chan and his family go for a picnic and spend time with a gangster and his bodyguards. Yoshinaga goes to change her clothes at Misae's place and forgets about the children in the bus. Shin-chan watches a noodles advertisement and feels the urge of eating noodles. He takes help from a neighbor and prepares noodles.
40.TitleJapanese: お花見はアブナいゾ / 長話はメイワクだゾ / ラーメンが急に食べたいゾ

41.TitleEnglish: Setting my sights upon Love in calligraphy! / Cleaning up the Kotatsu! / It's the introduction to the Buri Buri movie!
41.SummaryEnglish: ?? ?? It's the introduction to the Buri Buri Movie!, an introduction to one of the Crayon Shin-chan movies starring Shinnosuke Nohara and Buriburizaemon.
41.TitleJapanese: 書道で心をのにするゾ / こたつを片づけるゾ / ブリブリ映画紹介だゾ

42.TitleEnglish: I beat you at gathering shellfish! / Dreadful payday! / Great stingy plan!
42.SummaryEnglish: The kindergarten class goes shell hunting at the beach. Ms. Yoshinaga’s Sunflower class and Ms. Matsuzaka’s Rose class battle to find the most shells. On payday, Misae joyfully withdraws their monthly salary from the bank and returns home, only to find that the envelope she put the money in is gone. Hiroshi consoles her but feels very sad from within. Misae plans her monthly expenses and cuts down on food, electricity, water, and other expenses and promises to be careful with money.
42.TitleJapanese: 潮干狩で勝負だゾ / ひさんな給料日だゾ / ケチケチ大作戦だゾ

43.TitleEnglish: I play house with the leader of the gang! / Mom has no drivers license! / Lets learn how to drive!
43.SummaryEnglish: The kids play a restaurant game in school and make the principal a child. The principal joins them with the intention of learning something new. Misae decides to learn driving and gets herself enrolled in a motor driving school. She fails the first test. Misae goes for her driving class along with Shin-chan. Shin-Chan hangs out in a children's room with toy cars. Shin renders these cars as 'lame'. Shin-Chan then drives out of the room and on to the actual course distracting Misae and crashing the car into a sign by the curb. The instructor flunks and refuses to give Misae license because of Shin-chan's mischief.
43.TitleJapanese: 組長とままごとだゾ / 母ちゃんは運転免許がないゾ / 運転免許の教習だゾ

44.TitleEnglish: I want to eat expensive sweets! / Miss Matsuzaka is tired! / Mom ran away from home!
44.SummaryEnglish: Misae hides the fancy cookies she bought for guests where Shin-chan can’t find them, but he soon hunts them down. A battle to grab the cookies begins! Later, they eat the cookies together. After school, Ms. Matsuzaka runs into Shin-chan, who asks to see her home. She says that it’s a luxury apartment, when in fact it’s old and run-down! Hiroshi and Misae get into a fight about money. Suddenly, Misae is missing. Could she have run away? Worried, Hiroshi and Shin-chan search for her. But, Misae sleeps in the cabinet.
44.TitleJapanese: 高級お菓子が食べたいゾ / まつざか先生はお疲れだゾ / 母ちゃんの家出だゾ

45.TitleEnglish: Special lessons in traffic rules! / I want to see an alien! / My autograph book!
45.SummaryEnglish: Misae takes driving training from Shin-chan as he knows a lot about it. Shin-chan puts traffic signs all over the house as part of the training. Shin-chan and his friends assume a UFO to be in the sky. But they realize that it's a balloon created to advertise Action Mask. A very famous writer visits the bookstore. Shin-chan befriends the writer and impresses him.
45.TitleJapanese: 交通ルールの特訓だゾ / 宇宙人に会いたいゾ / オラのサイン本だゾ

46.TitleEnglish: Changing wardrobes at the change of seasons! / Lunch is barbecued beef! / The racetrack is fun!
46.SummaryEnglish: Shin-chan watches Misae cutting a long pant short. And later, after Misae goes out to attend a call, Shin-chan cuts all the clothes short. Misae and Shin-chan go to a restaurant and share the table with Moeko and Nene-chan. They end up eating the dish ordered by Moeko. Hiroshi and his family go to a race course to watch a horse race. The horse that Misae bets on, wins the race.
46.TitleJapanese: 衣がえをするゾ / ランチは焼き肉だゾ / 競馬場はおもしろいゾ

47.TitleEnglish: Riding my bicycle to kindergarten is fun! / Mom will get her drivers license! / I go for a drive with Mom!
47.SummaryEnglish: Shin-chan misses the kindergarten bus, so Misae has to take him by bike. While waiting at a red light, a beautiful woman pulls up alongside them. Misae is nervous before her driving test. When she finds out the childcare center is closed, Shin-chan must also come along. Will Misae pass her test? She drives very well keeping the traffic rules in mind. Hence, she passes the test. Misae gets her driving license and decides to drop Shin-chan to school in the car. However, she reaches the expressway and returns home in the night.
47.TitleJapanese: 自転車通園楽しいゾ / 運転免許がとれるゾ / 母ちゃんとドライブだゾ

48.TitleEnglish: Good boy, Shin-chan! / I go bowling! / I take care of Sabu-chan!
48.SummaryEnglish: Shin-chan gets yelled at by Misae for being a bad boy. He opens the fridge and drinks alcohol by mistake, which transforms him into a good boy. Misae and Hiroshi feel happy on seeing Shin-chan's changed behavior. Hiroshi and his family go bowling. Shin-chan scores a strike. Misae gets angry as Hiroshi and Shin-chan do not watch her play. Neighbor Mrs. Ujuin keeps her dog at Misae's place and goes to France for a holiday. Shin-chan gives a changes look to the dog by cutting her hair.
48.TitleJapanese: 良い子のしんちゃんだゾ / ボウリングをするゾ / サブちゃんのお世話だゾ

49.TitleEnglish: I go to the Tokyo Dome! / Strict rules of the girl leader of the group of bad kids! / A love letter from the girl leader of a group of bad kids!
49.SummaryEnglish: Hiroshi and his family go to Tokyo Dome to watch a baseball match. They, unknowingly, sit with the opposite team fans. A local girl gang meets at the park where Shin-chan is playing. The leader takes off in order to chase her crush despite love being against the rules. The Saitama group girls discuss their weekly routine. Ryuko decides to take help from a boy. But when she sees the boy hurt an old lady, she changes her mind.
49.TitleJapanese: 東京ドームへ行くゾ / スケバンの掟は厳しいゾ / スケバンのラブレターだゾ

50.TitleEnglish: I play with Dad! / Mountain climbing is tough! / The food section at the department store is fun!
50.SummaryEnglish: Hiroshi has to play golf with work associates instead of going on a hiking trip with the family. He does his best to slip past Shin-chan unnoticed But Shin-chan gets to know. So, Hiroshi plays with him. Hiroshi and his family go hiking. They choose the difficult road and click a picture together. The next morning, they suffer from body pain. Shin-chan visits a supermarket with Misae. He sticks 100 percent discount stickers on the things.
50.TitleJapanese: 父ちゃんと遊んでやるゾ / 山のぼりはつらいゾ / 食品売り場は楽しいゾ

51.TitleEnglish: Going to the zoo! / I be on a live broadcast! / Being a carpenter is tough!
51.SummaryEnglish: Hiroshi, Misae, and Shin-chan visit the zoo and click pictures. Shin-chan and Hiroshi are more interested in the pretty girls around them than the zoo animals. Shin-chan plays with the lemur and gets a beating from Misae. A TV channel asks the Futaba Kindergarten students to create a formation that spells Kasukabe. But when the show goes live, Shin-chan moves from his place and spoils the show. A contractor and his assistant visit Misae's house to repair the roof. In the night, Shiro's house leaks.
51.TitleJapanese: 動物園で遊んじゃうゾ / 生中継に出演するゾ / 大工さんは大変だゾ

52.TitleEnglish: I run away from home! / I do my best at the swimming meet! / Im good at Pachinko!
52.SummaryEnglish: Shin-chan leaves the house because he gets angry on Misae. But he returns home to eat the cakes brought by Misae. The school organizes a swimming competition. Masao gets scared to swim. But due to the fear in his mind, he swims at a good speed and wins the race. Hiroshi, Misae, and Shin-chan go to a video game parlour. While Hiroshi and Misae lose all their money, Shin-chan wins the game.
52.TitleJapanese: オラ家出しちゃうゾ / 水泳大会がんばるゾ / オラはパチンコの名人だゾ

1.TitleEnglish: Easy Going Mom! / The lost kitten! / I go see a new car!
1.SummaryEnglish: Misae drops Shin-chan to school by cycle and returns home. She wastes her day with the intention of completing her work later. Shin-chan helps Nene-chan find her lost cat. They go to different places to find the cat. But ultimately, they find her at the fish market. Hiroshi, Misae, and Shin-chan go to a car showroom to check the new cars. They pester the sales executive and return home.
1.TitleJapanese: お気楽母ちゃんだゾ / 迷子の子ネコちゃんだゾ / 新車を見に行くゾ

2.TitleEnglish: We will not fear the goons / Going to the Beach during Summer is Fun / Going for a boat ride
2.SummaryEnglish: Two goons trouble Masao and snatch his video game. As Masao starts crying, Shin-chan, Kazama and all other friends fight together against the goons and get Masao's game back. ?? Shin-chan and Misae go for a boat ride on the beach. They fall asleep in the boat and later realize that they are quite far away from the shore. After a long wait, the boat reaches the shore.
2.TitleJapanese: いじめっ子には負けないゾ / 夏の海辺は楽しいゾ / ボートで遊んじゃうゾ

3.TitleEnglish: Time for Summer Camp / A Test of Courage at Camp! / Distressed about the melon
3.SummaryEnglish: Shin-chan and his friends go on summer camp. They form a group and make their own tent and also help Yoshinaga in preparing a meal. The principal asks the students to prove their courage and sends them to stamp a paper in the forest, but Kazama get very scared. Misae keeps the watermelon for dinner, but Shin-chan eats it. Later, he puts the blame on Shiro, but gets caught by his mother.
3.TitleJapanese: 夏休みキャンプだゾ / キャンプで肝だめしだゾ / メロンで悩んじゃうゾ

4.TitleEnglish: Hiroshi struggles to sleep / Escape from the Rain with Big Sister / Watching the sea lion show
4.SummaryEnglish: Hiroshi decides to sleep early as he needs to wake up early, but Shin-chan gives Hiroshi an energy drink and keeps him awake. Hiroshi leaves for his office trip and dozes off during his journey. ?? Hiroshi and Misae take Shin-chan to watch the sea lion show. Shin-chan gets excited and also participates in the show. Shin-chan returns home with a sea lion toy.
4.TitleJapanese: 父ちゃんは眠れないゾ / お姉さんと雨やどりだゾ / アシカのショーだゾ
